info.title: Soccer
info.description: The API calls below can be used to test the Input and Output of our API endpoints.  You'll need an API key and an assigned secret to access the live data and so if you haven't contacted us yet, now is the time!  Our sales staff would be happy to set you up with trial access so you can begin to evaluate the product. Soccer

get.summary: The soccer leagues endpoint serves as a decode for...
get.description: The soccer leagues endpoint serves as a decode for the available leagues names, abbrevaitions, and URI paths.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The teams endpoint will be your source for team na...
get.description: The teams endpoint will be your source for team names, locations, abbreviations, and IDs.  You can get information about a single team by including the teamId.  If you do not include a teamId, you will get all the teams for the league

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Provide team ID to return information for one team.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get events for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: subSeason
parameters.description:
To get events for a different sub-season, enter the sub-season integer value.
  Default - the current sub-season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified round. Must be used in conjunction with eventTypeId. See the eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to each league & event type.
 Default - all rounds

parameters.name: allTeams
parameters.description: The /teams endpoint will by default return only teams in the most recent round. In order to see all teams in a league with multiple rounds, set allTeams to true.

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to the matches endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description:
Access to the matches endpoint will provide you with live scores, box scores, and play-by-plays.  The box, pbp, & touches parameters are only available when a single game is selected.
 Simple schedules are also available via the events endpoint.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp, and touches parameters.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: pbp
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'pbp=true'.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

parameters.name: touches
parameters.description:
Returns touch data, when available, for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'touches=true'.
  Default - touch data will not be returned

parameters.name: breakdowns
parameters.description:
Returns breakdown data, when available, for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'breakdowns=true'.
  Default - breakdown data will not be returned

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all events from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all events from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get events for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: subSeason
parameters.description:
To get events for a different sub-season, enter the sub-season integer value.
  Default - the current sub-season

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
Will return all events from a specific week number.
 Default - all weeks

parameters.name: originalWeek
parameters.description:
Will return all events from a specific original week number.
 Default - all weeks

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified round. Must be used in conjunction with eventTypeId. See the eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to each league & event type.
 Default - all rounds

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to the insights endpoint will provide you w...
get.description:
Access to the insights endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-play, manual commentary, and reporter insights.  The box, pbp, touches, commentary and insights parameters are only available when a single game is selected.
 Simple schedules are also available via the insights endpoint.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp, and touches parameters.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: pbp
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'pbp=true'.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

parameters.name: touches
parameters.description:
Returns touch data, when available, for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'touches=true'.
  Default - touch data will not be returned

parameters.name: autoCommentary
parameters.description:
Returns automated commentary, when available, for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'autoCommentary=true'.
  Default - Automated commentary will not be returned

parameters.name: commentary
parameters.description:
Returns manual commentary, when available, for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'commentary=true'.
  Default - Commentary will not be returned

parameters.name: insights
parameters.description:
Returns reporter insights, when available, for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'insights=true'.
  Default - Insights WILL be returned

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all events from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all events from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get events for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: subSeason
parameters.description:
To get events for a different sub-season, enter the sub-season integer value.
  Default - the current sub-season

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
Will return all events from a specific week number.
 Default - all weeks

parameters.name: originalWeek
parameters.description:
Will return all events from a specific original week number.
 Default - all weeks

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified round. Must be used in conjunction with eventTypeId. See the eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to each league & event type.
 Default - all rounds

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The soccer projections endpoint provides pre-match...
get.description: The soccer projections endpoint provides pre-match and live projections of a particular match.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp, and touches parameters.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: oddsbyevent
parameters.description:
Get match odds by play by play event sequence
  Default - odds by events will not be returned

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The participants endpoint provides biographical in...
get.description: The participants endpoint provides biographical information for players and can be used to return information on a single player, a single teams roster, or all teams rosters within the league.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: sinceYearLast
parameters.description:
Anyone who last played since the requested year.  Enter year as YYYY.
  Default - Current rosters for all teams in league

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

parameters.name: refereeId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific referee, enter their ID.

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

  Default - json

get.summary: The standings endpoint will provide the league sta...
get.description: The standings endpoint will provide the league standings, including all team data relevant to standings.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description:
Expanded includes additional data points for each team. Not avaialble for live standings.
 Default - false

parameters.name: live
parameters.description:
Where available, live standings reflect projected standings based on in-progress matches.
  Default - false, live standings will not be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get events for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: subSeason
parameters.description:
To get events for a different sub-season, enter the sub-season integer value.
  Default - the current sub-season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified round. Must be used in conjunction with eventTypeId. See the eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to each league & event type.
 Default - all rounds

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description:
Standings will be returned for the specified conference only.
  Default - When used without eventTypeId and eventRoundId, will default to latest round

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The standings endpoint will provide the league sta...
get.description: The standings endpoint will provide the league standings, including all team data relevant to standings.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Provide team ID to return information for one team.

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description:
Expanded includes additional data points for each team. Not avaialble for live standings.
 Default - false

parameters.name: live
parameters.description:
Where available, live standings reflect projected standings based on in-progress matches.
  Default - false, live standings will not be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get events for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: subSeason
parameters.description:
To get events for a different sub-season, enter the sub-season integer value.
  Default - the current sub-season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified round. Must be used in conjunction with eventTypeId. See the eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to each league & event type.
 Default - all rounds

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description:
Standings will be returned for the specified conference only.
  Default - When used without eventTypeId and eventRoundId, will default to latest round

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Soccer - Career stats for a single player

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: enc
parameters.description:
The encyclopedia returns full career and season-by-season totals.
  Default - when false, returns the current season only

parameters.name: careerOnly
parameters.description: For a single player's career stats, only to be used in conjunction with 'enc=true'

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified round. Must be used in conjunction with eventTypeId. See the eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to each league & event type.
 Default - all rounds

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: breakdowns
parameters.description:
Returns breakdown data, when available, for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'breakdowns=true'.
  Default - breakdown data will not be returned

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Soccer - Leaders

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Goals).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: nonQualifiers
parameters.description:
Should non-qualifiers be returned?
  Default - false

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Trailers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified round. Must be used in conjunction with eventTypeId. See the eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to each league & event type.
 Default - all rounds

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get events for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: subSeason
parameters.description:
To get events for a different sub-season, enter the sub-season integer value.
  Default - the current sub-season

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get leaders on one specific team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - leaders on all teams

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Soccer - Get all Injuries

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get events for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: healed
parameters.description:
Include injuries that have healed (ended)?
  Default - false:

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: By default, results include all injuries for a pla...
get.description:
By default, results include all injuries for a player (a) during the time period selected, (b) if the injury has not healed and (c) for all the teams the player was on during the time period.
 To return only those injuries while a player is on a specific team, you must include /teams/:teamId in the URI.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.

  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: fromLeagueId
parameters.description:
Returns only transfers from a specific league. See soccer/leagues endpoint for league IDs.
  Default - Transfers from all leagues.

parameters.name: toLeagueId
parameters.description:
Returns only transfers to a specific league. See soccer/leagues endpoint for league IDs.
  Default - Transfers to all leagues.

parameters.name: fromTeamId
parameters.description:
Returns only transfers from a specific team. See teams endpoint for team IDs.
  Default - Transfers from all teams.

parameters.name: toTeamId
parameters.description:
Returns only transfers to a specific team. See soccer/leagues endpoint for league IDs.
  Default - Transfers to all teams.

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: To return a single transfer, enter the transaction ID

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Soccer - Suspensions

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: suspensionTypeId
parameters.description:
Limit to either suspensions or near suspensions.
  Default - All suspension types

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get events for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Soccer - Odds

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all events from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all events from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get events for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for the specified round. Must be used in conjunction with eventTypeId. See the eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to each league & event type.
 Default - all rounds

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Soccer - Odds

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp, and touches parameters.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

get.summary: Soccer - Decodes

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the soccer/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: decodeType
parameters.description: The data type to be decoded.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get events for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: allSeasons
parameters.description:
For complete history of league, select 'true'. Only those permissioned for all historic data will be able to utilize this option.
  Default - All seasons will not be returned

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json
